MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Alsager, affecting properties in Edwards Way. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  9.30am. Our engineers are on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.55am on 27th of Feb 2021.
